column3: Accuracy of Performance reports submitted Paragraph 55 of the budget execution circular for the financial year 2019/2020 states that the Accounting Officer is required to submit quarterly performance reports by the 30 th day of the first month of the following quarter. These reports should clearly indicate the actual performance against the planned outputs and performance for each quarter, showing the quantity/quality and physical location of the reported outputs against expenditure. Works are completed Works are completed No variance Works are completed Works are completed No variance my review of the Annual Cumulative Performance Reports and physical inspections/verification of performance, I noted cases where the reported level of performance was inconsistent with the results of my verification as shown in the table below.
